title: Forjume Oil Sprayer for Cooking, 210ml Olive Oil Spray Bottle, Oil Sprayer Mister for Cooking, BBQ, Salad, Frying, Baking (Black)
features: 【FOOD GRADE OIL SPRAYER】Our olive oil sprayer is made of food-grade plastic material, BPA-FREE, 100% food safe. The sprayer is a perfect size and easy to fill and use.

【LARGER OIL MIST】This oil sprayer of the nozzle has been enhanced so that it can spray a larger and wider oil mist. Enhanced the food flavor and make the food more delicious. Meanwhile, the atomized oil is evenly distributed and covered on the food surface, thereby reducing oil output and calorie intake. Enjoy a low-fat healthy life.

【LEAK-PROOF】The large opening of the oil sprayer dispenser bottle makes the cooking oil sprayer easy to refill without a funnel, and the specially designed screw-interface design of the top-cap and anti-extrusion safety buckle will seal the bottle tightly to prevent leakage.

【MULTIPURPOSE OIL SPRAYER】Fill this sprayer with your oils, sunflower oil, vinegar, soy sauce, lemon and lime juice, sherry, or Marsala wine. And widely used for salad making, Cooking, Baking, Roasting, Grilling, drying, BBQ, and so on.

【Ergonomic Handle】With transparent design, this oil dispenser is convenient to know the status and the amount of oil, easy to recognize the seasoning(oil/vinegar/sauce) quickly. With the anti-slip cap and the friendly ergonomically designed handle makes it easier to use.
description: Forjume 210ml Oil Sprayer for Cooking, Olive Oil Spray Bottle, Oil Sprayer Mister for Cooking, BBQ, Salad, Frying, Baking Material: Made of highquality foodgrade PP material, PBA Free; It is light, durable, and not fragile, beautiful appearance, can match your kitchen and dining table Attention: 1. The spray pot used for cooking should not contain toothpick highdensity oil. 2. Because oil is easily solidified at lower temperatures, it may affect spray. Just run the nozzle under warm water for a few seconds and it will return to normal. 3. The best way to spray is to maintain the spray level at 45 degrees. 4. Do not put the product under high temperature and keep away from fire. 5. Please use less than 50°C water to clean the product. 6. If the spray is not used for a long time, it is recommended to clean the sprayer to prevent nozzle blockage. If the nozzle is blocked by oil or dust, clean it with warm water and press several times
